Based on my search results, here's what I found about Elvish language learning communities, resources, and courses for Sindarin and Quenya in 2024:

## Online Learning Communities

Several active communities exist for learning Tolkien's Elvish languages:

**Reddit Communities**
The r/Elvish subreddit is a great place to connect with other learners. It's got a bunch of resources and discussions that can help you out.

**Discord Servers**
There are a few Discord servers dedicated to learning Elvish. They're a good place to practice speaking and get help from other learners.(no content)The Discord is still open for you to ask questions and be part of the Sindarin learning community.

**Specialized Forums**
Elvish.org Forums: This one is a bit more advanced, but it's a great place to ask questions and get help from more experienced learners.

## Online Courses and Learning Platforms

**Popular Language Learning Apps**
Duolingo: Yeah, they have Elvish now. It's pretty basic, but it's a good place to start. You know, for the basics.(no content)Memrise: This one is a bit more in-depth. It's got a bunch of courses on both Quenya and Sindarin. Plus, it's free, which is always a plus.

**Specialized Elvish Learning Sites**
A site run by linguist Fiona Jallings, who has extensive knowledge of Neo-Sindarin and other Elvish conlangs. Phrasebooks, Word Lists, and FULL NEO-SINDARIN COURSES are available through The Academy!(no content)I am proud to say this website is free to use, and always will be. Click here to download a free PDF copy of the Sindarin - English dictionary (last updated Oct. 2024)(no content)Elvish courses, Quenya course, Sindarin course, quenya verb chart, Quenya-English dictionary, Sindarin-English dictionary, Tengscribe, YATT, Elvish transcriptors. ## Mobile Apps

**Quenya Learning App**
Learn Quenya Elvish vocabulary and speak the Quenya Elvish language by Tolkien! You can now learn basic Quenya Elvish vocabulary! Start learning Quenya Elvish language now!

**ElvenSpeak Apps**
Welcome to ElvenSpeak a guide to Tolkien's Elven Language of Quenya. Within this program you will find an English to Elvish search Dictionary, an Elven date converter, a language course and more. We offer this program free of charge in order to share our love for the language and culture.

## 2024 Publications

**Recent Dictionary Releases**
Quenya Dictionary 2024: Learn Quenya | Elvish Dictionary for all levels | English - Quenya | Quenya - English. Whether you're a complete beginner or a seasoned Quenya enthusiast, this comprehensive dictionary is your indispensable guide to mastering this enchanting constructed language. Features over 2,000 Quenya words with clear and concise English definitions!

## Scholarly Resources

**Elvish Linguistic Fellowship**
The Elvish Linguistic Fellowship (E.L.F.) is an international organization devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of J.R.R. Tolkien

However, it's important to note that according to the Elvish Linguistic Fellowship, an organization dedicated to the study of Tolkien's invented languages, even Quenya and Sindarin are simply not learnable: The vocabulary, grammar, and syntax of Tolkien's invented languages, even of Quenya and Sindarin, are far too incomplete to allow its casual, conversational, or quotidian use.

Most learning resources focus on "Neo-Sindarin" and "Neo-Quenya" - reconstructed versions that expand on Tolkien's incomplete work to make the languages more learnable for enthusiasts.
